[Bc]Description:

This jutsu allows the user to create one or more copies of themselves from their very on shadow. The user's�chakra�is evenly divided between themselves and their clones: creating one clone will give it half the user's chakra, creating two clones will give each a third of the user's chakra, and so on. The clones stats directly corellate, being the same % of the originals stats as the portion of split Chakra. For example, if 1 shadow clone is created, it will possess 50% of the users current chakra and stats. Depending on how much chakra the user has and how many clones they make, this rapid depletion of their reserves can be dangerous, limiting the castor to no more than 10 clones at any time.

Unlike the basic�Clone Technique, shadow clones are physically real. They possess the same clothing, damage, and transformations as the user at the time of their creation. Most tools and weaponry are copied when the shadow clones are created,�but�complicated technology�won't be duplicated. Because they are visually identical and possess the same chakra as the user, shadow clones are indistinguishable from their original, not even by�djutsu, presumably, other than the Rinnegan or the Tenseigan.

Because they have their own chakra, shadow clones can perform other�jutsu, including making more shadow clones. Shadow clones usually disperse once they or their castor runs out of their ChP or HP. When a clone's task is completed, it can disperse itself or be dispersed by its user. Once dispersed, the clone's intel, experiences, and 50% of their remaining chakra points are transferred back to the user. This also means any Jutsu Scores they increase directly adds to the user's once dispersed!
